article_title: Denver police release sketch of man suspected in sex assault – The Denver Post
article_text:
Police in Denver are asking for the public’s help in tracking down a man who grabbed a woman walking in the northeast part of the city earlier this month before sexually assaulting her.

The sex assault happened at about 4:15 p.m. on April 15 near the intersection of 29th Avenue and Oneida Street.

Police say the suspect fled on foot after the assault.

Investigators on Monday released a sketch of the man said to be suspected in the case.

Anyone with information in the case is asked to call Metro Denver Crime Stoppers at 720-913-7867.

Jesse Paul: 303-954-1733, jpaul@denverpost.com or twitter.com/JesseAPaul
